testcase.classname: To validate forgotten password functionality of facebook application
testcase.name: to validate forgotten password
testcase.system-out: Given User have to enter facebook login through chrome browser..............passed And User have to click the forgotten keyword................................passed When user have to enter email or phoneno....................................passed Then user have to click the search button...................................passed

testcase.name: to validate login using invalid usernme and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User have to enter facebook login through chrome browser..............passed When user enter" rea123@gmail.com" and "< password>"........................passed And user click the login button.............................................passed Then user should be in invalid credential page..............................passed
